data.title: darian: Name Meaning, Origin, History, And Popularity
data.meta_description: Darian is a masculine name with multiple meanings. Read this post to know more about the moniker.
data.text:
In This Article

Origin, Meaning and History of Darian

The name Darian is of Persian origin and is derived from the Persian king, Darius the Great. Darian is usually given to boys, although it is given to both boys and girls in some cultures. The most common meaning associated with the name is ‚Äòking.‚Äô The name is also believed to be derived from the Persian words ‚ÄòdƒÅraya,‚Äô which means ‚Äòto hold‚Äô or ‚Äòto possess,‚Äô and ‚Äòvahu,‚Äô which means ‚Äògood.‚Äô Hence, together the name could mean ‚Äòpossessing goodness‚Äô or ‚Äòhe who holds firm to good.‚Äô

Although the exact meaning of the name is unsure, the name seems to hold different meanings in different countries. The meaning of Darius in Indigenous Australia, Germany, and England is ‚Äòwealthy,‚Äô or ‚Äòupholder of the good.‚Äô In Croatia, Latvia, Poland, and Slovenia, the name means ‚Äòto maintain.‚Äô In Persian, Darius can be interpreted as ‚Äòa gift sent from heaven on Earth.‚Äô Darian can also be interpreted as ‚Äòof Arielle‚Äô from the name Darren and ‚Äòoak tree‚Äô from Darrell.

Darius I, commonly known as Darius the Great, was a Persian king. He was the third ruler of the Achaemenid Empire and was known for his military and administrative tactics. His building projects that remain in Persepolis are also widely appreciated. The king was known for his benevolence and kindness to the different groups of people who lived under his sovereignty.

There is a possibility that the name is derived from a rare Irish surname or it could be a different form of the name Darell. Some more variants of this name are Daren, Darin, Darion, Darien, Derren, Darrin, Darren, Darius, Daria, Daryus, Darus, Darreus, Daryos, Dariush, Darrias, Derrious, Derris, Darioush, Darrius, Dairus, and Dariusz.

The name also finds mention in fiction. Darian Firkin is a recurring fictional character in novels written by Mercedes Lackey. She writes fantasy novels where most of the story exists in the world of Velgarth. Darian Hallenbeck is a child character who appeared in the 1991 American action-comedy film The Last Boy Scout.

This section covers people who have made the name Darian famous with their contributions in various fields. It indeed is a little more inspiration for you to choose the name for your baby, don‚Äôt you think?

Darian On The Popularity Chart

The name hogged limelight towards the end of the century but reacorded steady decrease in rank and popularity in the following decades. Check out the graphs for more information.

Popularity Over Time

The name Darian was most popular in 1994, with 675 babies per million sharing the name. The following years saw a decrease in its usage and the name was shared by 227 babies per million in 2021.

Source:

Rank Over Time

The ranking of the name experienced a continuous downward trend till 2007 when it stood at 21,149 and then managed to go up to 18,280 in 2020. Look at the graph to understand how the name performed on the ranking chart.

Source:

Digital footprint of the name - it‚Äôs presence on the internet and social media platforms - can provide you with valuable insights on it‚Äôs popularity. A name‚Äôs online presence is an important metric for new parents to evaluate their options and make an informed choice. How many people are searching the name on Google, how many profiles are there on Facebook, does the name have a Wikipedia page? Such information surely tells you if the name is ubiquitous or unique. Here is how Darian fares on that count.

Anagram Names Of Darian

William Shakespeare is known for his ‚Äòonomastic wit,‚Äô with anagrams being one of them (remember the play Twelfth Night?). Anagram is the rearrangement of the same letters to form different words. Anagramming names has been in vogue for centuries now, and why not when it can create some cute names? Anagram baby names stand out with their unique sound and spellings. You may try an anagram of your name or your partner‚Äôs; even better if you combine both names and then try an anagram for the baby. It all stays in the family this way. You may also try anagram names for siblings, especially twins. Here are some anagrams of Darian.

Darian‚Äôs Zodiac Sign As Per Western Astrology

Western astrology includes the construction of a horoscope based on the person‚Äôs exact time of birth and location to understand the positions of the planet, stars, and zodiac signs at that time. However, in popular culture, it is often narrowed down to the sun sign, which depends on the person‚Äôs birth date.There are 12 zodiac signs, each having dominant traits, planetary rulers, elemental connection, and more.

Zodiac sign or Sun sign

The Earth‚Äôs orbit around the sun is divided into 12 zodiac signs covering 30-degree sectors. According to Western astrology, the zodiac or sun sign depends on the sun‚Äôs position in one of these sectors at the time of your birth. Starting from the sun‚Äôs position at the March equinox, the chart goes anti-clockwise from Aries, followed by Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, and Pisces. These signs are ruled by planetary bodies - Mars, Venus, Mercury, Moon, Sun, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune. Furthermore, they are categorized into triplicities or elemental signs - fire, water, air, and earth - that govern their characteristics. Each of these zodiac signs features certain personality traits that may determine how a person presents themselves.

Each zodiac sign in Western astrology is linked to a specific range of dates in the year. Unlike Vedic astrology, where names can sometimes be used to infer astrological details, Western astrology relies entirely on the birth date.

To know more about your baby‚Äôs zodiac sign, choose the period in which your baby‚Äôs date of birth falls, from the options given below. This will give you a glimpse into the world of astrology tailored for your baby.

Darian‚Äôs Zodiac Sign And Birth Star As Per Vedic Astrology

Darian Personality Traits As Per Numerology

The numerology belief system envisages a relationship between a name and numbers. The related numbers are believed to give insights into a person‚Äôs character. We have researched this area to connect the numerology-based characteristic traits to the letters of the English alphabet. And the results are fascinating.

Numerology followers believe that each letter signifies attributes that can influence a person‚Äôs attitude and approach. Among these placements, the most significant are the first letter (Cornerstone) and the last letter (Capstone) of a name. Cornerstone highlights your primary personality traits and explains how you face challenges and opportunities in life. Capstone can tell you about your approach to work and how you complete them. Often, a letter may be repeated twice or more in a name. This repetition signifies the intensification or amplification of the traits associated with the letter in an individual‚Äôs personality.

Read to know what characteristics the name Darian is known for in numerology. Here we have avoided repetition of letters and added them just once for a better reading experience.

Infographic: Know The Name Darian‚Äòs Personality As Per Numerology
